items.content_html: "check-online" is a user-friendly Node.js package designed to determine a user's current internet connectivity status. This lightweight tool offers a straightforward way to check network connectivity, empowering developers to create applications that adapt to online and offline scenarios.

This lightweight tool offers a straightforward way to check network connectivity, empowering developers to create applications that adapt to online and offline scenarios.
